body: I'm sorry, but if I was the writer, I would have ended it differently. I would have Makoto make sure she never did it again by stabbing her in the heart, killing her at the height of ecstasy. Then he would drag her body to her room, the two boys already dead in there. Then he would leave a recording of everything that happened that weekend running on the tv,for his father and uncle to find. Meanwhile, he would pack a bag and leave, never to be seen again. Now, that is revenge. Its one thing to steal a girlfriend or wife. Its another to steal a boy's mother.
This is how ntr should be man why can’t the nigga never get revenge
Finally someone  in this series  that said fuck getting  ntr'ed 😂🤣😂🤣
